name: Datura (GGJ2023 DEMO)
description:
Demo created during the GGJ2023
 Rini spent her whole life as a research subject at the Datura Institute, hoping her mysterious illness will, at last, be cured. 

When her best friend and fellow "lab bunny" Coella disappears,  Rini must navigate the perils of life under the ever-watchful eyes of the Institute's director, while trying to find out Coella's fate.
